FilePublisherRule.Name: (Default Rule) All signed packaged apps
FilePublisherRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run packaged apps that are signed.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) Microsoft Windows DLLs
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to load DLLs located in the Windows folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All DLLs located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to load DLLs that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All DLLs
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to load all DLLs.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All files located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run applications that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All files located in the Windows folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run applications that are located in the Windows folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All files
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all applications.

FilePublisherRule.Name: (Default Rule) All digitally signed Windows Installer files
FilePublisherRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run digitally signed Windows Installer files.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All Windows Installer files in %systemdrive%\Windows\Installer
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run all Windows Installer files located in %systemdrive%\Windows\Installer.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All Windows Installer files
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all Windows Installer files.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All scripts located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run scripts that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All scripts located in the Windows folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run scripts that are located in the Windows folder.

FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All scripts
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all scripts.
